ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Reed's Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet V 2.4
ygData.messageBody:
Oopsie =/

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
> Sent: Monday, September 10, 2001 2:13 PM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Reed's Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet V 2.4
>
>
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Reed Stormwind [mailto:eqreed@...]
> > Sent: Monday, September 10, 2001 2:05 PM
> > To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: [eqbards] Reed's Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet V 2.4
> >
> >
> > A new spreadsheet is out.
> >
> > Not a lot of changes this time, but thought I should refresh what's
> > out there:
> >
> > Reduced all instrument modifiers by a hair (to reflect a rounding
> > problem Verant seems to have).
> > Charm doesn't work on 52+ mobs.
> > Changed the DoT value of Angstlich's Assonance (60) to
> match measured
> > results.
> > I just listed the Shield of Song (49) as just dropping in Erudine
> > (got rid of the whole Seafarer's Roost thing).
> > Misc. spelling errors.
> >
> > Again, it can be found at www.eqsongs.com and
> www.eqdiva.com (should
> > be up shortly) or at my site here:
> > http://www.geocities.com/eqreed/BardSongSpreadsheet.html
> >
> > - Reed Stormwind (57 bard of E'ci) <Forlorn>
> >
